final_answer:
The humor in the image stems from the contrasting perspectives of a diver and swimmers. On the left, the diver is surrounded by abundant marine life, showcasing a serene underwater world. The caption "YES," suggests an idealized view of ocean exploration.

On the right, the "BUT" panel humorously contrasts this with the reality of crowded beaches, where the view from beneath is just the legs of swimmers. This satirical depiction highlights the difference between expectations of a peaceful dive and the chaotic, less glamorous reality just beneath the water surface. It plays on the idea of how perceptions can change based on perspective.
